name: NSRuleEditor.NestingMode
desc: Specifies a type for nesting modes.

items.name: case list
items.desc: Allows a single list, with no nesting and no compound rows.

items.name: case simple
items.desc: One compound row at the top with subrows beneath it, and no further nesting allowed.

items.name: case single
items.desc: Only a single row is allowed.
